problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Most trading losses aren't bad luck — they're human. Fear, greed, inconsistency, and biased backtests turn good ideas into losing trades. Algo removes those human errors by converting your strategy into repeatable rules and rigorous backtests.

items.question: Do I need to know how to code?
items.answer: No. Describe your strategy and Algo builds the bot.

items.question: Will Algo guarantee profits?
items.answer: No. Algo automates creation and testing — no guarantees. Past performance is not indicative of future results. This is not financial advice.

items.question: Can I change the bot after it's built?
items.answer: Yes. Edit rules, rerun backtests, and version before deployment.

items.question: Is live trading available now?
items.answer: Not yet. Algo currently builds and backtests bots. Live execution is coming soon; join the waitlist.
